cometSaveWeights.command:
import maya.mel as mm
import iRig_maya


iRig_maya_dir = os.path.dirname(iRig_maya.__file__)
mel_script = 'cometSaveWeights'

comet_save_weights_path = os.path.join(iRig_maya_dir, 'mel', mel_script + '.mel')
comet_save_weights_path = comet_save_weights_path.replace('\\', '/')
mm.eval('source "{}"'.format(comet_save_weights_path))
mm.eval(mel_script)
